r.d: The PEAR package contains: * the PEAR base class * the PEAR_Error error handling mechanism * the PEAR installer, for creating, distributing and installing packages * the OS_Guess class for retrieving info about the OS where PHP is running on * the System class for quick handling common operations with files and directories
r.n:
PEAR Installer:
* Bug #171 --alldeps with a rel="eq" should install the required version, if possible * Bug #249 installing from an url doesnt work * Bug #248 --force command does not work as expected * Bug #293 [Patch] PEAR_Error not calling static method callbacks for error-handler * Bug #324 pear -G gives Fatal Error (PHP-GTK not installed, but error is at engine level) * Moved download code into its own class * Fully unit tested the installer, packager, downloader, and PEAR_Common
